content: the ballet wrap cardigan is knitted top down with saddle shoulder and raglan technique it is an overlapped design with a cropped style and it is designed to have a tight fit the main pattern is a rib pattern with knit2 purl1 **sizes** xs s m l xl xxl **finished garment measurements** the cardigan has ~5 cm positive ease so you have to calculate with that when you choose the size bust circumference 86 90 94 98 102 106 cm full length 46 47 48 49 50 51 cm length from the underarm 24 24 26 26 28 28 cm sleeve length from underarm 50 cm in all size or desired length **used yarn** 1 strand of drops flora 200 200 250 300 350 350 g hold together with 1 strand of drops brushed alpaca 150 150 200 250 300 300 g recommendation is to use a similar kind of fingering type of yarn held together with lace type of yarn **gauge** knitting with the main pattern k2 p1 10x10cm = 23 stitch x 27 row **needles** 4 mm circular needles for the body 3 5 mm circular needles and double pointed needles for the double band and the tie belt **used techniques/abbreviations** m1l →make one left m1r →make one right m1pl →make one purl left m1pr → make one purl right k2tog → knit to together ssk → slip slip knit bor → beginning of the round double edge cast on/knitting judy s magic cast on italian bind off ig @lsz_juli
